Song.title: O Holy Night
Song.copyright: Music by Adolphe Adam. Lyrics by John Dwight (Public Domain)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [C]O holy night, the [F]stars are brightly [C]shining; It is the [Am]night of the [G7]dear Savior’s [C]birth! [C]Long lay the world in [F]sin and error [C]pin[C7]ing, Till He ap[Em]peared and the [B7]soul felt its [Em]worth. A [G7]thrill of hope,{,} the [C]weary soul rejoices, For [G7]yonder breaks{,} a [C]new and glorious [C/G]morn.
Chorus 1: [Am]Fall on your [Em]knees,{,} O [Dm]hear the angel [Am]voices! O [C G7]night, di[C F]vine!{,} O [C/E]night [G7] [ ]when Christ was [C]born! O [G G7]night, di[C F]vine!{,} O [C]night, [G7] [ ]O holy [C]night!
Verse 2: Led by the light of faith serenely beaming, With glowing hearts by His cradle we stand. So led by light of a star sweetly gleaming, Here came the wise men from Orient land. The King of kings lay thus in lowly manger, In all our trials born to be our Friend!
Chorus 2: He knows our need—to our weakness is no stranger. Behold your King; before Him lowly bend! Behold your King; before Him lowly bend!
{new_page} Verse 3: [C]Truly He taught us to [F]love one a[C]nother; His law is [Am]love and His [G7]Gospel is [C]peace. [C]Chains shall He break, for the [F]slave is our [C]bro[C7]ther And in His [Em]Name all op[B7]pression shall [Em]cease. Sweet [G7]hymns of joy,{,} in [C]grateful chorus raise we, Let [G7]all within us{,} [C]praise His holy [C/G]Name!
Chorus 3: [Am]Christ is the [Em]Lord!{,} O [Dm]praise His name for[Am]ever! His [C G7]pow’r and [C]glo[F]-ry{,} [C/E]e[G7]-vermore pro[C]claim! O [G G7]night, di[C F]vine!{,} O [C]night, [G7] [ ]O holy [C]night!
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o holy night the stars are brightly shining it is the night of the dear saviors birth long lay the world in sin and error pining till he appeared and the soul felt its worth a thrill of hope the weary soul rejoices for yonder breaks a new and glorious morn chorus 1 fall on your knees o hear the angel voices o night divine o night when christ was born o night divine o night o holy night verse 2 led by the light of faith serenely beaming with glowing hearts by his cradle we stand so led by light of a star sweetly gleaming here came the wise men from orient land the king of kings lay thus in lowly manger in all our trials born to be our friend chorus 2 he knows our needto our weakness is no stranger behold your king before him lowly bend behold your king before him lowly bend verse 3 truly he taught us to love one another his law is love and his gospel is peace chains shall he break for the slave is our brother and in his name all oppression shall cease sweet hymns of joy in grateful chorus raise we let all within us praise his holy name chorus 3 christ is the lord o praise his name forever his powr and glory evermore proclaim o night divine o night o holy night

Chorus 1: [Am]Fall on your [Em]knees,{,} O [Dm]hear the angel [Am]voices! O [C G7]night, di[C F]vine!{,} O [C/E]night [G7] [ ]when Christ was [C]born! O [G G7]night, di[C F]vine!{,} O [C]night, [G7] [ ]O holy [C]night!

Sweet [G7]hymns of joy,{,} in [C]grateful chorus raise we, Let [G7]all within us{,} [C]praise His holy [C/G]Name!

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [C]O holy night, the [F]stars are brightly [C]shining; It is the night of the [G7]dear Savior’s [C]birth! [C]Long lay the world in [F]sin and error [C]pin[C7]ing, Till He ap[Em]peared and the [B7]soul felt its [Em]worth. A [G7]thrill of hope,{,} the [C]weary soul rejoices, For [G7]yonder breaks{,} a [C]new and glorious [C/G]morn.
Chorus 1: [Am]Fall on your [Em]knees,{,} O [Dm]hear the angel [Am]voices! O [C G7]night, di[C F]vine!{,} O [C/E]night [G7] [ ]when Christ was [C]born! O [G G7]night, O [C F]holy [C]night,[G7] O night div[C]ine!
Verse2: [C]Humbly He lay, Cr[F]eator come as c[C]reature, Born on the floor of a [G7]hay-scattered [C]stall. [C]True Son of God, yet [F]bearing human [C]feat[C7]ure, He entered [Em]earth to re[B7]verse Adam’s [Em]fall. In [G7]towering grace, He [C]laid aside His glory, And [G7]in our place, was [C]sacrificed for sin.
Chorus 2: [Am]Fall on your [Em]knees,{,} O[Dm] hear the gospel [Am]story! O [C G7]night, di[C F]vine!{,} O [C/E]night [G7] [ ]when Christ was [C]born! O [G G7]night, O [C F]holy [C]night,[G7] O night div[C]ine!
{new_page} Verse 3: [C]Come then to Him Who [F]lies within the [C]manger, With joyful shepherds, procl[G7]aim Him as [C]Lord. [C]Let not the Promised [F]Son remain a st[C]ran[C7]ger; In reverent w[Em]orship, make C[B7]hrist your A[Em]dored. Et[G7]ernal life is t[C]heirs who will receive Him; With [G7]grace and peace, their [C]lives He will adorn.
Chorus 3: [Am]Fall on your [Em]knees! Rec[Dm]eive the Gift of [Am]heaven! O [C G7]night, di[C F]vine!{,} O [C/E]night [G7] [ ]when Christ was [C]born! O [G G7]night, O [C F]holy [C]night,[G7] O night div[C]ine!
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o holy night the stars are brightly shining it is the night of the dear saviors birth long lay the world in sin and error pining till he appeared and the soul felt its worth a thrill of hope the weary soul rejoices for yonder breaks a new and glorious morn chorus 1 fall on your knees o hear the angel voices o night divine o night when christ was born o night o holy night o night divine verse2 humbly he lay creator come as creature born on the floor of a hayscattered stall true son of god yet bearing human feature he entered earth to reverse adams fall in towering grace he laid aside his glory and in our place was sacrificed for sin chorus 2 fall on your knees o hear the gospel story o night divine o night when christ was born o night o holy night o night divine verse 3 come then to him who lies within the manger with joyful shepherds proclaim him as lord let not the promised son remain a stranger in reverent worship make christ your adored eternal life is theirs who will receive him with grace and peace their lives he will adorn chorus 3 fall on your knees receive the gift of heaven o night divine o night when christ was born o night o holy night o night divine
